summary: Female, Nord, Sexy, Hot, sw33gy, first mod ever, called Lia
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod uploaded on the nexus, I am no longer a modder virgin!...
Moving swiftly on, this mod / follower is a female Nord called Lia. She can be found in Riverwood, opposite Alvor's, the blacksmith part of his house, leaning over a wooden fence.

=============================
Installation:

1) Download file from this website
2) Go to your downloads
3) Go to your Skyrim directory - steamapps\common\skyrim\data
4) Open the file with 7zip / winrar
5) Drag the lia_follower.esp into the data folder
6) Drag the textures to the data, and when prompted to merge, press yes.
7) Launch Skyrim from steam and make sure the .esp is checked
8) Press Ok
9) Launch skyrim via what ever means possible
10) Go to riverwood, opposite Alvor's smithing part of his house

=============================

To get Lia like the screenshots, you will need

Sevenbase --- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?
Some skimpy Armour mod, cant remember the name
Pretty Female Idles --- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?
Apachii Skyhair --- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D10168%26user%3D1&pUp=1#
author: samuelf80
